name: Little Copter [Prototype]
description:
Little Copter

Take your low res chopper and extinguish those fires!

Controls

Arrow keys -> move

Spacebar (hold) -> carry water

I decided to make something simple, playing around with smaller resolutions and some particle effects. Heres a little prototype with a couple stages and a boss!

Thanks for playing and let me know your best times! :D

- Ash
